product_name: Eagle Creek Silk Undercover Money Belt
long_description: Durable silk construction makes the Eagle Creek Silk Undercover money belt the most comfortable security piece you'll ever wear against your skin. 2 zippered pockets organize passport, currency and credit cards; sweat-resistant coated satin lining. Soft elastic waistbelt adjusts to provide a comfortable, secure fit; slip pocket on back stores the Undercover's waistbelt.
short_description: Durable silk construction makes the Eagle Creek Silk Undercover money belt the most comfortable security piece you'll ever wear against your skin.
